item.title: Electrics, hybrids and ICE: Suzuki advocates multi pathway approach for the next decade
item.description: Japanâ€™s Suzuki Motor Corporation (SMC) has underlined the efficacy of HEVs, saying that in regions where adoption of non-fossil fuel electric energy is lower, HEVs are the best choice. In a 10-year technology roadmap outlined earlier today, Chief Technology Officer Katushiro Kato has said that EVs become the better choice only when adoption of non-fossil fuel electric energy reaches 75%.
